name: Zatch Bell! Mamodo Fury
description: Zatch Bell! Mamodo Fury (金色のガッシュベル!! 激闘!最強の魔物達, Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Gekitou! Saikyou no mamonotachi, lit. Golden Gash Bell!! Clash! Strongest Demons) is a fighting game released on the PlayStation 2. The original Japanese version was published by Bandai at the end of 2004, after merging with Namco but before the formation of Namco Bandai Games. The subsequent international releases and the GameCube versions were published under Namco Bandai Games. The game is based on the Zatch Bell! franchise.
